original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.82. Saraṇaduka, Parittārammaṇattika🔽Saraṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.🔽Saraṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya         saraṇam paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati  hetu paccayā araṇam paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve  saraṇam mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati  hetu paccayā araṇam mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.🔽Araṇaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve 🔽araṇam appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
